page.title: 15BOSTON FAIR
page.content: It is held in the market place and it comes every year in May.The fair starts at the first of May.And finishes on the eighth of May.It has to be out of town by midnight.The fair first started between 1125 and 1135. You can buy food from stalls like candy floss and hot dogs.The stalls sell a lot of rock and nougat.Sometimes the rides are cheap, but mostly they are 20 to 40pence. The first fair was a trading fair where merchants bought things from there.The fair is also held on the green.The rides are fast,slow, big and little.
